episodes.title: Celebration
episodes.description: Media magnate Logan Roy shocks his family with a stunning announcement on his 80th birthday. The news shatters his son Kendall, the heir apparent who's in the midst of negotiating the purchase of digital-media venture.

episodes.title: Sh*t Show at the F**k Factory
episodes.description: While Logan is in the hospital, tensions rise when backup plans should be made by the family.

episodes.title: Lifeboats
episodes.description: As their first act as CEO and COO, Ken and Roman try to dig the company out of a financial mess. Meanwhile, Marcia prevents the family from seeing the recovering Roy.

episodes.title: Sad Sack Wasp Trap
episodes.description: The family attends an annual company gala overseen by Connor and highlighted by a surprise announcement.

episodes.title: I Went to Market
episodes.description: Kendall begins to plot a vote of no confidence against Logan; Tom questions his prenup.

episodes.title: Which Side Are You On?
episodes.description: Roman and Kendall attempt to sway the board, while Shiv explores her options in D.C.

episodes.title: Austerlitz
episodes.description: The Roys gather for a family therapy session; Kendall finds his sobriety tested.

episodes.title: Prague
episodes.description: Tom has a bachelor's party to remember; Kendall and Roman eye new business opportunities.

episodes.title: Pre-Nuptial
episodes.description: The Roys assemble at an English castle for Shiv's and Tom's wedding; Kendall's plans are fast-tracked.

episodes.title: S1.E10 âˆ™ Nobody Is Ever Missing
episodes.description: Roman faces technical difficulties. Tom marks his territory. Kendall hits rock bottom with tragic consequences.

episodes.title: The Summer Palace
episodes.description: Still addled from the events in England, Kendall tries to make amends with his dad; Logan receives some unvarnished advice from his financial banker; Tom maneuvers for a new position in the company.

episodes.title: Vaulter
episodes.description: Roman and Kendall do a "routine health check" of a new media brand to help Vaulter determine the future of the company; Tom tasks Greg with sniffing out waste at ATN; Connor and Willa host a soiree to mark their return to New York.

episodes.title: Hunting
episodes.description: Logan informs his skeptical management team of his plan to make another attempt to acquire Pierce; Greg worries his pre-meeting will put his standing with the family at risk; Connor's presidential announcement irritates Logan.

episodes.title: Safe Room
episodes.description: Roman begins a six-week management training program in the Parks division; Logan and Kendall arrange a covert meeting with a PGM CEO as a controversy surrounding a star anchor leads to a day of chaos at ATN headquarters.

episodes.title: Tern Haven
episodes.description: Shiv, Roman and Connor veer from their roles at a weekend retreat to woo the Pierces.

episodes.title: Argestes
episodes.description: Logan's deal with the Pierces is threatened; Kendall, Shiv and Roman differ on damage control strategies.

episodes.title: Return
episodes.description: A trip to the UK finds the Roy kids negotiating with their mother; Logan turns to Rhea for advice.

episodes.title: Dundee
episodes.description: The entire Roy clan travels to Logan's hometown of Dundee, Scotland, for a celebration of Logan's 50 years in the business; Kendall becomes enamored with Jennifer, an actress in Willa's play; a former employee proves difficult to silence.

episodes.title: DC
episodes.description: Logan, Kendall, Gerri and Tom testify before Congress; Shiv speaks candidly to Kira, a victim who is set to be a key witness; in Turkey, Roman's business pitch takes a chilling turn.

episodes.title: This Is Not for Tears
episodes.description: Logan looks for a sacrificial lamb among his closest allies as the future of the company hangs in the balance.

episodes.title: Secession
episodes.description: Following his bombshell presser, a righteous Kendall scrambles to find a base of operations, while Logan's team searches for safe harbor.

episodes.title: Mass in Time of War
episodes.description: Kendall tries to get his siblings, as well as Stewy and Sandi on his side. Fearing his legal situation, Greg asks Ewan for help.

episodes.title: The Disruption
episodes.description: With the DOJ at the door, Logan summons his arsenal, while Tom makes a potentially life changing offer. Kendall becomes obsessed with his own takedown.

episodes.title: Lion in the Meadow
episodes.description: Logan and Kendall have their first meeting together with Josh, a major investor worried about their family feud.

episodes.title: Retired Janitors of Idaho
episodes.description: Kendall and the Waystar team find themselves working together at the annual shareholders' meeting, where Logan's health takes a turn.

episodes.title: What It Takes
episodes.description: Logan and team head to Virginia for a conservative political conference, where Roman finds out surprising news about his mother.

episodes.title: Too Much Birthday
episodes.description: At Kendall's lavish birthday bash, Shiv and Roman try to arrange a meeting with Lukas Matsson, a tech mogul who recently snubbed Logan.

episodes.title: Chiantishire
episodes.description: At a luxe family wedding in Italy, Roman airs suspicions, Gerri draws a line, and the Waystar team grows concerned about rogue tweets.

episodes.title: All the Bells Say
episodes.description: Matsson's vision for the business leads Shiv and Roman to manage the fallout, while Logan weighs his options.

episodes.title: The Munsters
episodes.description: As Kendall, Shiv, and Roman hone their pitch for investors in LA, Logan learns of a rival bid on a long-coveted acquisition.

episodes.title: Rehearsal
episodes.description: While Kendall, Shiv, and Roman consider an aggressive play on the Matsson deal, Connor tries to make the most of his rehearsal dinner.

episodes.title: Connor's Wedding
episodes.description: While Logan doles out an unsavory task ahead of his trip to meet Matsson, Connor fixates on minutiae at his wedding.

episodes.title: Honeymoon States
episodes.description: As the Waystar team discusses a pivotal recommendation to the board, Roman, Kendall, and Shiv navigate a misstep with Matsson.

episodes.title: Kill List
episodes.description: After the Waystar team heads to Norway, Shiv, Kendall, and Roman consider whether to fight for Logan's crown jewel.

episodes.title: Living+
episodes.description: Ahead of Investor Day, Shiv weighs a proposal from Matsson, while Kendall and Roman each try to match Logan's volatile leadership style.

episodes.title: Tailgate Party
episodes.description: Hoping to work the angles, Kendall and Roman ask Shiv to invite a campaign insider to Logan's pre-election day party.

episodes.title: America Decides
episodes.description: On election night, Tom tries to manage an increasingly chaotic newsroom, while Kendall, Shiv, and Roman spar over the consequences of the result for themselves, the company, and the country.

episodes.title: Church and State
episodes.description: As the family girds themselves for an emotional funeral, Kendall finds himself at odds with Rava and inopportune news from Jess. Shiv tries to reposition herself in a new political landscape, and Kendall rallies supporters to his side.

episodes.title: With Open Eyes
episodes.description: Ahead of the final board meeting on the Waystar-Gojo Deal, Kendall and Shiv try to shore up their opposing interests...and get a fix on the whereabouts of a physically and emotionally bruised Roman.
